scripts.test: find ./tests -name '*spec.js' | xargs nyc --reporter=html --reporter=text mocha -R spec --require babel-core/register
scripts.link_modules: cd src && npm link && cd .. && npm link @app/src
scripts.prestart: cd src && npm link && cd .. && npm link @app/src
scripts.pretest: cd src && npm link && cd .. && npm link @app/src
scripts.coveralls: find ./tests -name '*spec.js' | xargs nyc --reporter=text-lcov mocha -R spec --require babel-core/register | coveralls
scripts.precoveralls: cd src && npm link && cd .. && npm link @app/src
